segments.text: Does your chicken taste all right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The chicken tastes wonderful , but it is kind of dry . Is your fish OK ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My fish has good seasoning but is a little dry .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It seems as if they got busy and left it sitting before it got to us .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , maybe they are short-handed in the kitchen tonight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are your vegetables a little mushy ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The vegetables seem to not be very fresh .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I usually enjoy the meals here , so I think that we should tell the waiter that there is something wrong with this meal .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think that we should let someone know . They will probably want to fix the problem .
segments.speaker: S2
